alert.note: Alert for Cleveland; Gaston; Lincoln (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 07 at 7:13PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Lincoln, central Cleveland and northwestern Gaston Counties through 745 PM EDT... At 713 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Lawndale, or 7 miles north of Shelby, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Shelby, Cherryville, Belwood, Lawndale, Fallston, Polkville, Waco, and Kingstown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
